name: Bellfield Brewery
measures: **Tin for a can** in support of local food banks: drop off a tin of fish, meat, veg, pulses or fruit (no baked beans please!) at the yard in Abbey Hill and swap it for a free can of beer. No-contact drop off area is provided.
Order beers for pickup at the brewery or home delivery on the [online shop](https://www.bellfieldbrewery.com/collections/gluten-free-beer) or Amazon
[Buy a voucher](https://www.bellfieldbrewery.com/pages/events) that can be redeemed at the taproom for draught or take away beer as well as future tours and merchandise
Pick up direct at the brewery Monday - Friday, 10am - 4pm
